info.title: Auto-generated OAS of Cassandra using OOPS

200.description: Service is ready to handle requests

500.description: Service is not ready to handle requests

200.description: Cassandra is able to achieve the specified consistency

500.description: Cassandra is unable to achieve the specified consistency

200.description: List of new seeds after reload

parameters.description: The MB/s throughput cap for compaction in the system, or 0 to disable throttling
parameters.name: value

parameters.description: The address of the node to assassinate.
parameters.name: address

400.description: Cassandra node assasination request missing address

parameters.description: The component or class to set the log level for.
parameters.name: target

parameters.description: A list of snapshot names to clear
parameters.name: snapshotNames

parameters.description: A list of keyspaces to clear snapshots from
parameters.name: keyspaces

requestBody.description: The keyspace to repair The tables to repair Whether to do a full repair

parameters.description: The new token to move the node to.
parameters.name: newToken

202.description: Job ID for successfully scheduled Cassandra node move request

parameters.description: Whether the user is a superuser
parameters.name: is_superuser

parameters.description: Whether the user can log in
parameters.name: can_login

parameters.description: The profile to use for starting Cassandra/DSE.
parameters.name: profile

parameters.description: The IP address to replace in the Cassandra/DSE configuration.
parameters.name: replace_ip

202.description: Cassandra already running and can connect

204.description: Cassandra already running but can't connect

206.description: Cassandra process not found but can connect

keyspaces.description: A list of keyspaces to snapshot

skipFlush.description: Whether to skip flushing the data

keyspaceTables.description: A list of keyspace and table names to snapshot, in the format 'keyspace.table'

userDefinedFiles.description: A list of user-defined files for compaction.

jobs.description: Number of jobs to run concurrently

keyspaceName.description: The name of the keyspace to create the table in.

tableName.description: The name of the table to create.

columnNamesAndTypes.description: A string representation of column names and their types.

partitionKeyColumnNames.description: An array of partition key column names.

clusteringColumnNames.description: An array of clustering column names.

staticColumnNames.description: An array of static column names.

jobs.description: Number of jobs to run concurrently

keyspaceName.description: The name of the keyspace to create

replicationSettings.description: The replication settings for the keyspace.

replicationSettings.description: The replication settings for the keyspace

startToken.description: The start token for a token range compaction.

endToken.description: The end token for a token range compaction.
